articles.title: BFW opens plant in Tamil Nadu’s Hosur - The Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: CHENNAI: Machine tool solution provider Bharat Fritz Werner Ltd (BFW) has inaugurated its manufacturing facility at Devaganapalli near Hosur in Tamil .
